channel.title: Bioinformatics on In Data We Trust
channel.description: Recent content in Bioinformatics on In Data We Trust

item.title: Reproducing iDEP analyses with auto-generated R Markdown
item.description: This R markdown file was auto-generated by iDEP, a tool for interactive analysis of RNA-Seq data. It is assumed that users have analyzed their data with iDEP by clicking through all the tabs and have downloaded the related files to a folder. 1. Read data R packages and iDEP core Functions. Users can also download the iDEP_core_functions.R file. Many R packages needs to be installed first. This may take hours.
